author: _shemnon
content: Re: create 4.  Based on the mega-spec it looks like it could be used outside of an EOF container, which is why I put it in the F block.  The deployed contract is part of the body of the transaction and the reference to the transaction comes in the stack, not as an immediate argument.  I'm fine moving it but that was my rationalle.

author: axic3354
content: Right, so one way to group is where it can be used, another way is to what functionality it belongs to.

author: _shemnon
content: I was reserving 0xE? for where it can be used.  If you want it moved say the word.
